subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: This section describes properties that configure the FileManager UI component's contents, behavior, and appearance.

subMembers.name: allowedFileExtensions
subMembers.description: Specifies the allowed upload file extensions.

subMembers.name: contextMenu
subMembers.description: Configures the context menu settings.

subMembers.name: currentPath
subMembers.description: Specifies the path that is used when the FileManager is initialized.

subMembers.name: currentPathKeys
subMembers.description: Specifies an array of path keys to the current location.

subMembers.name: customizeDetailColumns
subMembers.description: Customizes columns in [details view]. Applies only if **itemView**.[mode] is *"details"*.

subMembers.name: customizeThumbnail
subMembers.description: Allows you to provide custom icons to be used as thumbnails.

subMembers.name: fileSystemProvider
subMembers.description: Specifies the file system provider.

subMembers.name: focusedItemKey
subMembers.description: Specifies a key of the initially or currently focused item.

subMembers.name: columns
subMembers.description: Configures the columns.

subMembers.name: details
subMembers.description: Configures the "Details" file system representation mode.

subMembers.name: itemView
subMembers.description: Configures the file and directory view.

subMembers.name: mode
subMembers.description: Specifies the file system representation mode.

subMembers.name: showFolders
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to display folders in the view. When this property is **false**, folders are displayed in the navigation pane only.

subMembers.name: showParentFolder
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to display the parent directory in the view.

subMembers.name: notifications
subMembers.description: Configures notification settings.

subMembers.name: showPanel
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to show the progress panel.

subMembers.name: showPopup
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to show the pop-up notification window.

subMembers.name: copy
subMembers.description: Specifies whether a user is allowed to copy files and directories.

subMembers.name: create
subMembers.description: Specifies whether a user is allowed to create files and directories.

subMembers.name: delete
subMembers.description: Specifies whether a user is allowed to delete files and directories.

subMembers.name: download
subMembers.description: Specifies whether a user is allowed to download files.

subMembers.name: move
subMembers.description: Specifies whether a user is allowed to move files and directories.

subMembers.name: permissions
subMembers.description: Specifies actions that a user is allowed to perform on files and directories.

subMembers.name: rename
subMembers.description: Specifies whether a user is allowed to rename files and directories.

subMembers.name: upload
subMembers.description: Specifies whether a user is allowed to upload files.

subMembers.name: rootFolderName
subMembers.description: Specifies the root directory display name.

subMembers.name: selectedItemKeys
subMembers.description: Contains an array of initially or currently selected files and directories' keys.

subMembers.name: selectionMode
subMembers.description: Specifies whether a user can select a single or multiple files and directories in the [item view] simultaneously.

subMembers.name: toolbar
subMembers.description: Configures toolbar settings.

subMembers.name: chunkSize
subMembers.description: Specifies a chunk size, in bytes.

subMembers.name: maxFileSize
subMembers.description: Specifies the maximum upload file size, in bytes.

subMembers.name: upload
subMembers.description: Configures upload settings.

subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: This section describes properties that configure a custom file system provider.

subMembers.name: abortFileUpload
subMembers.description: A function that cancels the file upload.

subMembers.name: copyItem
subMembers.description: A function that copies files or directories.

subMembers.name: createDirectory
subMembers.description: A function that creates a directory.

subMembers.name: deleteItem
subMembers.description: A function that deletes a file or directory.

subMembers.name: downloadItems
subMembers.description: A function that downloads files.

subMembers.name: getItems
subMembers.description: A function that gets file system items.

subMembers.name: getItemsContent
subMembers.description: A function that get items content.

subMembers.name: hasSubDirectoriesExpr
subMembers.description: A function or the name of a data source field that provides information on whether a file or directory contains sub directories.

subMembers.name: moveItem
subMembers.description: A function that moves files and directories.

subMembers.name: renameItem
subMembers.description: A function that renames files and directories.

subMembers.name: uploadFileChunk
subMembers.description: A function that uploads a file in chunks.

subMembers.name: Custom
subMembers.description: A custom file system provider allows you to implement custom APIs to access and use file systems.

subMembers.name: File System Providers
subMembers.description: File system providers are components that provide APIs used to access and modify virtual file systems. This section describes file system providers supported by the FileManager.

subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: This section describes the file system provider's properties.

subMembers.name: dateModifiedExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies which data field provides timestamps that indicate when a file was last modified.

subMembers.name: isDirectoryExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies which data field provides information about whether a file system item is a directory.

subMembers.name: keyExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the data field that provides keys.

subMembers.name: nameExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies which data field provides file and directory names.

subMembers.name: sizeExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies which data field provides file sizes.

subMembers.name: thumbnailExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies which data field provides icons to be used as thumbnails.

subMembers.name: FileSystemProviderBase
subMembers.description: Contains base provider settings.

subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: This section describes properties that configure the **Object** file system provider.

subMembers.name: contentExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies which data field provides information about files content.

subMembers.name: data
subMembers.description: Specifies an array of data objects that represent files and directories.

subMembers.name: itemsExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies which data field provides information about nested files and directories.

subMembers.name: Object
subMembers.description: The **Object** file system provider works with a file system represented by an in-memory array of JSON objects.

subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: This section describes properties that configure the **Remote** file system provider.

subMembers.name: beforeAjaxSend
subMembers.description: Specifies a function that customizes an Ajax request before it is sent to the server.

subMembers.name: beforeSubmit
subMembers.description: Specifies a function that customizes a form submit request before it is sent to the server.

subMembers.name: endpointUrl
subMembers.description: Specifies the URL of an endpoint used to access and modify a file system located on the server.

subMembers.name: hasSubDirectoriesExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies which data field provides information about whether a directory has subdirectories.

subMembers.name: requestHeaders
subMembers.description: Specifies the request headers.

subMembers.name: Remote
subMembers.description: The **Remote** file system provider works with a file system located on the server.

subMembers.name: FileSystemError
subMembers.description: An object that contains information about the error.

subMembers.name: errorCode
subMembers.description: The error code.

subMembers.name: errorText
subMembers.description: The error message.

subMembers.name: fileSystemItem
subMembers.description: The processed file or directory.

subMembers.name: Fields
subMembers.description: Fields that provide information about a file system item.

subMembers.name: dataItem
subMembers.description: The file system data object that stores information about the file system item (name, size, modification date, etc.).

subMembers.name: dateModified
subMembers.description: A timestamp that indicates when the file system item was last modified.

subMembers.name: hasSubDirectories
subMembers.description: Specifies whether a directory has subdirectories.

subMembers.name: isDirectory
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the file system item is a directory.

subMembers.name: key
subMembers.description: The file system item's key.

subMembers.name: name
subMembers.description: The file system item's name.

subMembers.name: path
subMembers.description: The file system item's path.

subMembers.name: pathKeys
subMembers.description: The file system item's path specified in keys.

subMembers.name: size
subMembers.description: The file system item's size (in bytes).

subMembers.name: thumbnail
subMembers.description: An icon (URL) to be used as the file system item's thumbnail.

subMembers.name: FileSystemItem
subMembers.description: An object that provides information about a file system item (file or directory) in the [FileManager] UI component.

subMembers.name: Interfaces
subMembers.description: This section describes interfaces that the {WidgetName} component uses.

subMembers.name: UploadInfo
subMembers.description: An object that provides information about the file upload session.

subMembers.name: bytesUploaded
subMembers.description: The number of bytes that is uploaded to the server.

subMembers.name: chunkBlob
subMembers.description: The binary content of the uploading chunk.

subMembers.name: chunkCount
subMembers.description: The number of uploaded chunks and chunks that are to be uploaded.

subMembers.name: chunkIndex
subMembers.description: The index of the uploading chunk.

subMembers.name: customData
subMembers.description: Custom information that you can pass during file upload. For instance, you can specify a custom file ID when the first part of a file is being uploaded.

properties.name: dxFileManager
properties.description: The FileManager is a UI component that allows users to upload, select, and manage files and directories in different file storages.

Methods.name: refresh()
Methods.description: Reloads data and repaints the UI component.

Events.name: onContentReady
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component is rendered and each time the component is repainted.

Events.name: onContextMenuItemClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when a context menu item is clicked.

Events.name: onContextMenuShowing
Events.description: A function that is executed before a context menu is displayed.

Events.name: onCurrentDirectoryChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed when the current directory is changed.

Events.name: onDirectoryCreated
Events.description: A function that is executed when a directory is created.

Events.name: onDirectoryCreating
Events.description: A function that is executed before a directory is created.

Events.name: onDisposing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is [disposed of].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#dispose').

Events.name: onErrorOccurred
Events.description: A function that is executed when an error occurs.

Events.name: onFileUploaded
Events.description: A function that is executed when a file is successfully uploaded.

Events.name: onFileUploading
Events.description: A function that is executed before the file is uploaded.

Events.name: onFocusedItemChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed when the focused item is changed.

Events.name: onInitialized
Events.description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the UI component instance.

Events.name: onItemCopied
Events.description: A function that is executed when a file or directory is copied.

Events.name: onItemCopying
Events.description: A function that is executed before a file or directory is copied.

Events.name: onItemDeleted
Events.description: A function that is executed when a file or directory is deleted.

Events.name: onItemDeleting
Events.description: A function that is executed before a file or directory is deleted.

Events.name: onItemDownloading
Events.description: A function that is executed before a file is downloaded.

Events.name: onItemMoved
Events.description: A function that is executed when a file or directory is moved.

Events.name: onItemMoving
Events.description: A function that is executed before a file or directory is moved.

Events.name: onItemRenamed
Events.description: A function that is executed when a file or directory is renamed.

Events.name: onItemRenaming
Events.description: A function that is executed before a file or directory is renamed.

Events.name: onOptionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after a UI component property is changed.

Events.name: onSelectedFileOpened
Events.description: A function that is executed when the selected file is opened.

Events.name: onSelectionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed when a file system item is selected or selection is canceled.

Events.name: onToolbarItemClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when a toolbar item is clicked.

Events.name: contextMenuItemClick
Events.description: Raised when a context menu item is clicked.

Events.name: contextMenuShowing
Events.description: Raised before the context menu is displayed.

Events.name: currentDirectoryChanged
Events.description: Raised when the current directory is changed.

Events.name: directoryCreated
Events.description: Raised when a directory is created.

Events.name: directoryCreating
Events.description: Raised before a directory is created.

Events.name: errorOccurred
Events.description: Raised when an error occurs during file processing.

Events.name: fileUploaded
Events.description: Raised when a file is uploaded.

Events.name: fileUploading
Events.description: Raised before a file is uploaded.

Events.name: focusedItemChanged
Events.description: Raised when the focused item is changed.

Events.name: itemCopied
Events.description: Raised when a file or directory is copied.

Events.name: itemCopying
Events.description: Raised before a file or directory is copied.

Events.name: itemDeleted
Events.description: Raised when a file or directory is deleted.

Events.name: itemDeleting
Events.description: Raised before a file or directory is deleted.

Events.name: itemDownloading
Events.description: Raised before a file is downloaded.

Events.name: itemMoved
Events.description: Raised when a file or directory is moved.

Events.name: itemMoving
Events.description: Raised before a file or directory is moved.

Events.name: itemRenamed
Events.description: Raised when a file or directory is renamed.

Events.name: itemRenaming
Events.description: Raised before a file or directory is renamed.

Events.name: selectedFileOpened
Events.description: Raised when the selected file is opened.

Events.name: selectionChanged
Events.description: Raised when a file system item is selected or selection is canceled.

Events.name: toolbarItemClick
Events.description: Raised when a toolbar item is clicked.

Types.name: ContentReadyEvent
Types.description: The type of the [contentReady] event handler's argument.
